description: This vegan burrito bowl recipe is inspired by Chipotle but cheaper and healthier because you make it at home. The perfect meal prep!
keywords: dinner prep for the week, easy dinner recipe
name: Vegan Burrito Bowl (Chipotle Inspired)
recipeIngredient: 2 cups Cilantro Lime Rice (, or use any rice you prefer)
2 cups Vegan Carnitas (, or any other taco meat you prefer (see note)
1 cup black beans (, homemade or store bought)
1 cup corn salad (, or use plain corn or corn salsa)
1 cup fresh salsa (, or any salsa you prefer)

recipeInstructions.text: Build the burrito bowls by putting the 3/4 cup lettuce, 1/2 cup rice, and 1/2 cup carnitas, 1/4 cup beans and 1/4 cup fajita veggies at the bottom of each bowl.
Top with 1/4 cup guacamole, 1/4 cup corn salad, and 1/4 cup salsa. Add any other garnishes you prefer!
